places_with_reviews.name: Garden Palace Heritage Homestays
address: Palace road, Brahmani Society, Balasinor, Gujarat 388255, India

reviews.text:
Garden Palace Heritage Homestays was very nice
Very Comfartable bad and sofa, room is very clean and staf coprative, all services very fast.
This hotal available in budget friendly rooms.
Transport facility available all time

Nawab Saab & Begum Saheba run a lovely homestay in their ancestral property. They gave us the warmest hospitality, paying attention to the slightest detail. The food is delicious and with very unique flavors. The location is very peaceful, quiet but right next to the quaint old town of Balasinor. Go here to experience a slice of history & to see old world India not tampered by gentrification

Balasinor State was founded BY Gujarati Muslim ruler Nawab, Sardar Muhammed khan Babi belonging to the family of last deputy Governor of Gujarat province in Mughal Empire. The rulers were titled Nawab Babi. It was a 9 gun salute state belonging to the Rewa Kantha Agency of the Bombay Presidency. The Last ruling Nawab Nawab[citation needed] was HH Nawab Muhammed Salabat Khanji II who died on 25 January 2018.The heir and son of Nawab Muhammed Salabat Khanji II Nawabzada Sultan Salauddinkhan Babi, born 1979 and educated at the Rajkumar College, Rajkot was crowned the titular Nawab of Balasinor on 4 March 2018 at the Raj Tilak and Gaadi Dastoor ceremony performed by both Islamic and Rajput traditions at their Garden Palace In Balasinor after the 40 days of mourning ended on 3 March 2018.

I had great meeting with HH NAWABZADA SULTAN SALAUDDINKHAN BABI.He had shown the whole palace with full of paintings n ancient monuments

Unique-u really feel that how gracefull were our royals lived earlier.

Next to the dinosaur park, you can enjoy a taste of royalty by learning about Balasinor’s royal family while enjoying the luxurious rooms and wildlife, such as bats, goats and roosters (that wake you up)!
Amazing place feel like the Mughals Era palace must visit ambience is superb

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Aakash
address: Indore - Ahamadabad Hwy, Balasinor, Gujarat 388235, India

reviews.text: Hear is a very thadkalss staff ands rooms anny times drinking resapnest
Food options are limited but taste is good
Very arrogant staff, busy watching and playing mobile. Avoid visiting this place.

Good food tried kathiyawadi thali, kaju curry, Special paneer and butter roti.  The kathiyawadi Thali food was little spicy but all in all it was good in taste.  They serve 3 different sabzi in kathiyawadi Thai.  I tried sev tamatar ki sabzi, moong ki sabzi, baingan bharta and sukhe Aloo ki sabzi here. Service was good and hotel was also clean and hygienic. They serve variety of food here Punjabi, Chinese, kathiyawadi and south Indian. Kathiyawadi thali price was 120 and Punjabi thali was 140.
The food is tasty...just like dhabha style. The bathroom though is not well maintained.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Mayur
address: X86Q+7F8, Shree Ram Society, Indraprasth Society, Balasinor, Gujarat 388255, India

reviews.text: This is a good place to get reasonably good food and economical rates. The variety is available and staff is really and ready at your service. The manager is really cooperative with giving insights for the where to find what in balasinor. Also they have a lodging facility and the rooms are decent ones. They have installed cameras to it helps when you park your vehicle outside their hotel.
Very Bed service
The cleanness of the hotel was so poor. Very bad service. And food is average. Not so impressive
One of the best hotel which have constant test of food from many years.

Gujarati , Punjabi & Chinese food
Average quality , best quantity
And medium quality room to stay

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Quality Inn
address: Zalod - Ahmedabad Hwy, Vadadala, Gujarat 388235, India

reviews.text: I ate lots of dishes but I got very bad service and poor quality food 😪 And Also staff members are very disrespectful 😔 when visited few months ago it was good but nowadays it's very bad .😕
Very good place management clean place food are very good

Very good quality food and service
And good atmosphere

absolutely fell in love with this leafy eco-village and our stone cottage, the surroundings are so green and well maintained and we had a restful and relaxing time by the pool and in our stone cottage. All the members of staff are super friendly and helpful. Pro tip: don't miss trying out the covilhetes (mince pies) available to order from reception in the evening. So delicious!”
Worst management 😒 they dont care about customer even dont take order . We have to go to them for giving order. Never go there . Waste of time and money

places_with_reviews.name: Shreeji (madhuli)panjabi. gujrati. Kathiyavadi
address: X87R+PVJ, GJ SH 2, Shree Ram Society, Indraprasth Society, Balasinor, Gujarat 388265, India

reviews.text: Nice place for family. Staff were good and friendly and helped us deciding items for kids.  Gujarati thali was good in taste and quantity. We tried Dal bati on their recommendation which turned out good.

Such a nice vegitarian hotel Restaurant...
Tea is must try..
Child water there..
Good behaviour of manager and All staff..
Such agreate place for family..
The on way dhaba type hotel and good food if you travel between Balasinor to lunavada road.
Very Dirty place not cleaning table n washbasin...so please suggest to hotel management that take care of places
Very bad
